$$quality = \beta_{0} + \beta_{1}alcohol + \\
\beta_{2}sulphates + \beta_{3}citric.acid + \beta_{4}fixed.acidity + \epsilon_{i}$$



```{r}
#| label: setup
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
library(gtsummary)
```

```{r}
#| label: loadData
#| message: false

# Load the dataset
wine <- read.csv("http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/wine-quality/winequality-red.csv", sep = ";")
```

```{r}
#| label: model
#| cache: true
#| message: false

fit<- brm(data = wine,
          formula = quality ~ alcohol + sulphates + citric.acid + fixed.acidity,
          family = gaussian(),
          silent = 2,
          refresh = 0,
          seed = 12)

fixef(fit)

fit |> 
  tbl_regression(intercept = TRUE)

pp_check(fit)
```
